input: I paid ₹50,000 to a freelancer. How much TDS should I deduct?
output: For a payment of ₹50,000 to a freelancer (professional services) in FY 2025-26, deduct TDS at 10% under Section 194J, as the amount exceeds the ₹30,000 threshold. TDS = ₹50,000 × 10% = ₹5,000. Pay the freelancer ₹45,000 and deposit ₹5,000 to the government by the 7th of the next month. Issue Form 16A via TRACES. Does the freelancer have a lower TDS certificate?
